creditline: The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund
description: couple engaged in intercourse; woman wears a purple kimono with orange and red flowers; man has green plaid garment beneath him; sewing kit in URQ; pipe and tobacco pouch, LLQ; text to left of man's head
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Twelve Bouts in the Way of Love (Shikidō torikumi jūniban 色道取組十二番)
text: A woman is on top of her lover and in full control as she squeezes him tightly around his neck. In the foreground is a tobacco pipe and pouch, in the background is her sewing kit.
title: Seamstress and her Lover, No. 6 from Twelve Bouts in the Way of Love (Shikidō torikumi jūniban)
